const ichigun = {
     title:'Players',

const coaches =
    {title: 'Coaches',
        players: [
            { name: 'Suzuki', position: 'Bullpen Coach' },
            { name: 'Yamamoto', position: 'Trainer' }
        ]};

        title: 'Managers',
